definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: The algorithm is demonstrated via comparison with variational method and genetic algorithms (GAs).
sentences.chinese: 通過與變分法和遺傳算法的比較，展示了算法的性能。

sentences.english: The variational method is a branch of mathematics, and was developed in the 17th century.
sentences.chinese: 變分法是17世紀末發展起來的一門數學分支。

sentences.english: The differential equation for the vibration of the riser system is derived by means of functional calculus of variation.
sentences.chinese: 採用泛函變分法導出了隔水管的振動微分方程。

sentences.english: The necessary conditions for optimality were derived by calculus of variations.
sentences.chinese: 利用變分法原理，推導出滿足優化問題的必要條件。

sentences.english: Variation calculus has been widely used in mathematical physics.
sentences.chinese: 變分法在數學物理問題中有着廣泛的應用。

sentences.english: Using the variational approach, we investigate the dynamics of the vector solitons.
sentences.chinese: 通過變分法，我們研究了矢量孤子的動力學。

sentences.english: The characteristic impedance of rectangular groove stripline has been obtained by means of the variational method.
sentences.chinese: 本文運用格林函數法及變分法分析了矩形槽微帶線。
